// ✅ frontend/src/utils/api.js
import axios from"axios";const api=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"http://192.168.0.160:1120/api",withCredentials:true});api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");const user=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")||"{}");const authToken=token||(user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.token);if(authToken){console.log('Adicionando token à requisição:',authToken.substring(0,10)+'...');config.headers.Authorization=`Bearer ${authToken}`;console.log('Headers configurados:',config.headers);}return config;},error=>Promise.reject(error));api.interceptors.response.use(response=>response,error=>{var _error$response;if(((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.status)===401){localStorage.removeItem("token");localStorage.removeItem("user");window.location.href="/login";}return Promise.reject(error);});export default api;
